channel.title: Spectrum-Scape 508 ECO
channel.description:
[size=25pt]Homepage----> http://spectrum-scape.webs.com/
Webclient ---> www.Spectrum-scape.tk
Download client ---> [/size]http://uppit.com/3vnf0g2hhzja/Spectrum-Scape.jar
[size=25pt]Some Features[/size]
[size=15pt]- 24.7 online---vps hosted - 15 bosses - fun pk - great pking weapons - all minigames working - 100% overloads - great shops and donor benefits - All pvp armour - Chaotics - Primal Weapons - Torva, virtus, penix, and primal - DICING - full curses - all skills working - a ton more![/size]
[size=25pt]Spectrum-Scape has over 15 BOSSES![/size]

item.title: Spectrum-Scape 508 ECO
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:

EMPIRIOUS:

website is a let down

Well were a brand new server, came out 2 days ago. Any suggestions to make it better?

Read full topic

item.title: Spectrum-Scape 508 ECO
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:449455”][quote author=DevinCooley link=topic=552353.msg4046668#msg4046668 date=1342144602]
So what are you waiting for? Come and join us today!
[/quote]

I’ll wait for you to fix those hitmarks, the white should be transparent.
How can someone PK while staring at those messed up sprites?[/quote]

Yea i was hearing a lot of complaints on them. So i went ahead and changed them.

Read full topic
